lead_paragraph: To the Editor: David Gelernter's ''Religion of Special Effects'' (Op-Ed, March 30) is misguided. He attributes the cultists' death, in part, to the suppression of religion in the public sphere but fails to discuss the rise of irrationality in American society.
abstract: Seymour Newman letter disputes David Gelernter's March 30 Op-Ed article on mass suicide by members of Heaven's Gate cult in California (S)

headline.kicker: Cultists' Deaths Call Our Insight Into Question
